verses.kjv: Then I looked, and, behold, in the firmament that was above the head of the cherubims there appeared over them as it were a sapphire stone, as the appearance of the likeness of a throne.
verses.web: Then I looked, and see, in the expanse that was over the head of the cherubim there appeared above them as it were a sapphire stone, as the appearance of the likeness of a throne.
verses.ct: Then I looked up, and there above the heads of the cherubim was the expanse, and hovering over it was what looked like a sapphire stone shaped like a throne.

verses.kjv: And he spake unto the man clothed with linen, and said, Go in between the wheels, even under the cherub, and fill thine hand with coals of fire from between the cherubims, and scatter them over the city. And he went in in my sight.
verses.web: He spoke to the man clothed in linen, and said, “Go in between the whirling wheels, even under the cherub, and fill both your hands with coals of fire from between the cherubim, and scatter them over the city.” He went in as I watched.
verses.ct: God spoke to the man dressed in linen and said, "Go in between the whirling wheels beneath the cherubim. Fill both your hands with burning coals from among the cherubim and scatter them over the city." The man went in as I watched.

verses.kjv: Now the cherubims stood on the right side of the house, when the man went in; and the cloud filled the inner court.
verses.web: Now the cherubim stood on the right side of the house, when the man went in; and the cloud filled the inner court.
verses.ct: The cherubim were standing on the south side of the temple when the man went in, and the cloud filled the inner courtyard.

verses.kjv: Then the glory of the LORD went up from the cherub, and stood over the threshold of the house; and the house was filled with the cloud, and the court was full of the brightness of the LORD’s glory.
verses.web: LORD’s glory mounted up from the cherub, and stood over the threshold of the house; and the house was filled with the cloud, and the court was full of the brightness of LORD’s glory.
verses.ct: Then the glory of the LORD rose from above the cherubim and moved to the threshold of the temple. The entire temple was filled with the cloud, and the courtyard blazed with the brightness of the LORD's glory.

verses.kjv: And the sound of the cherubims’ wings was heard even to the outer court, as the voice of the Almighty God when he speaketh.
verses.web: The sound of the wings of the cherubim was heard even to the outer court, as the voice of God Almighty when he speaks.
verses.ct: The sound of the cherubim's wings could be heard all the way to the outer courtyard — it was like the voice of the Almighty God when he speaks.

verses.kjv: And it came to pass, that when he had commanded the man clothed with linen, saying, Take fire from between the wheels, from between the cherubims; then he went in, and stood beside the wheels.
verses.web: It came to pass, when he commanded the man clothed in linen, saying, “Take fire from between the whirling wheels, from between the cherubim,” that he went in, and stood beside a wheel.
verses.ct: When God commanded the man dressed in linen, "Take fire from between the whirling wheels, from among the cherubim," the man went in and stood beside one of the wheels.

verses.kjv: And one cherub stretched forth his hand from between the cherubims unto the fire that was between the cherubims, and took thereof, and put it into the hands of him that was clothed with linen: who took it, and went out.
verses.web: The cherub stretched out his hand from between the cherubim to the fire that was between the cherubim, and took some of it, and put it into the hands of him who was clothed in linen, who took it and went out.
verses.ct: One of the cherubim reached out his hand into the fire burning among them, scooped up some of it, and placed it into the hands of the man dressed in linen. The man took it and went out.

verses.kjv: And there appeared in the cherubims the form of a man’s hand under their wings.
verses.web: The form of a man’s hand appeared here in the cherubim under their wings.
verses.ct: Beneath the wings of the cherubim, something shaped like a human hand could be seen.

verses.kjv: And when I looked, behold the four wheels by the cherubims, one wheel by one cherub, and another wheel by another cherub: and the appearance of the wheels was as the colour of a beryl stone.
verses.web: I looked, and behold, there were four wheels beside the cherubim, one wheel beside one cherub, and another wheel beside another cherub. The appearance of the wheels was like a beryl stone.
verses.ct: I looked and saw 4 wheels beside the cherubim — one wheel next to each cherub. The wheels gleamed like beryl stone.

verses.kjv: And as for their appearances, they four had one likeness, as if a wheel had been in the midst of a wheel.
verses.web: As for their appearance, the four of them had one likeness, like a wheel within a wheel.
verses.ct: All 4 wheels looked identical, and each one appeared to have a second wheel intersecting it at a right angle — a wheel within a wheel.

verses.kjv: When they went, they went upon their four sides; they turned not as they went, but to the place whither the head looked they followed it; they turned not as they went.
verses.web: When they went, they went in their four directions. They didn’t turn as they went, but to the place where the head looked they followed it. They didn’t turn as they went.
verses.ct: When they moved, they could go in any of their 4 directions without turning. Whichever way the lead face was looking, the rest followed — they never turned as they moved.

verses.kjv: And their whole body, and their backs, and their hands, and their wings, and the wheels, were full of eyes round about, even the wheels that they four had.
verses.web: Their whole body, including their backs, their hands, their wings, and the wheels, were full of eyes all around, even the wheels that the four of them had.
verses.ct: Their entire bodies — their backs, their hands, their wings, and all 4 wheels — were covered with eyes all the way around.

verses.kjv: As for the wheels, it was cried unto them in my hearing, O wheel.
verses.web: As for the wheels, they were called in my hearing, “the whirling wheels”.
verses.ct: I heard the wheels called out by name in my hearing: "the whirling wheels."

verses.kjv: And every one had four faces: the first face was the face of a cherub, and the second face was the face of a man, and the third the face of a lion, and the fourth the face of an eagle.
verses.web: Every one them had four faces. The first face was the face of the cherub. The second face was the face of a man. The third face was the face of a lion. The fourth was the face of an eagle.
verses.ct: Each cherub had 4 faces: the first was the face of a cherub, the second was the face of a man, the third was the face of a lion, and the fourth was the face of an eagle.

verses.kjv: And the cherubims were lifted up. This is the living creature that I saw by the river of Chebar.
verses.web: The cherubim mounted up. This is the living creature that I saw by the river Chebar.
verses.ct: Then the cherubim rose into the air. These were the same living creatures I had seen by the Chebar River.

verses.kjv: And when the cherubims went, the wheels went by them: and when the cherubims lifted up their wings to mount up from the earth, the same wheels also turned not from beside them.
verses.web: When the cherubim went, the wheels went beside them; and when the cherubim lifted up their wings to mount up from the earth, the wheels also didn’t turn from beside them.
verses.ct: Whenever the cherubim moved, the wheels moved right alongside them. When the cherubim spread their wings to rise from the ground, the wheels didn't separate from them — they stayed right beside them.

verses.kjv: When they stood, these stood; and when they were lifted up, these lifted up themselves also: for the spirit of the living creature was in them.
verses.web: When they stood, these stood. When they mounted up, these mounted up with them; for the spirit of the living creature was in them.
verses.ct: When the cherubim stood still, the wheels stood still. When the cherubim rose, the wheels rose with them, because the spirit of the living creatures was in the wheels.

verses.kjv: Then the glory of the LORD departed from off the threshold of the house, and stood over the cherubims.
verses.web: LORD’s glory went out from over the threshold of the house, and stood over the cherubim.
verses.ct: Then the glory of the LORD moved away from the threshold of the temple and came to rest above the cherubim.

verses.kjv: And the cherubims lifted up their wings, and mounted up from the earth in my sight: when they went out, the wheels also were beside them, and every one stood at the door of the east gate of the LORD’s house; and the glory of the God of Israel was over them above.
verses.web: The cherubim lifted up their wings, and mounted up from the earth in my sight when they went out, with the wheels beside them. Then they stood at the door of the east gate of LORD’s house; and the glory of the God of Israel was over them above.
verses.ct: As I watched, the cherubim spread their wings and rose from the ground, with the wheels right beside them. They stopped at the entrance of the east gate of the LORD's temple, and the glory of the God of Israel hovered above them.

verses.kjv: This is the living creature that I saw under the God of Israel by the river of Chebar; and I knew that they were the cherubims.
verses.web: This is the living creature that I saw under the God of Israel by the river Chebar; and I knew that they were cherubim.
verses.ct: These were the same living creatures I had seen beneath the God of Israel by the Chebar River. Now I recognized them — they were cherubim.

verses.kjv: Every one had four faces apiece, and every one four wings; and the likeness of the hands of a man was under their wings.
verses.web: Every one had four faces, and every one four wings. The likeness of the hands of a man was under their wings.
verses.ct: Each one had 4 faces and 4 wings, and beneath their wings were what looked like human hands.

verses.kjv: And the likeness of their faces was the same faces which I saw by the river of Chebar, their appearances and themselves: they went every one straight forward.
verses.web: As for the likeness of their faces, they were the faces which I saw by the river Chebar, their appearances and themselves. They each went straight forward.
verses.ct: Their faces looked exactly like the ones I had seen by the Chebar River — the same appearance, the same beings. Each one moved straight ahead in whatever direction it faced.
